definition: Three Gorges Dam on the Yangtze River
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The flooding reignites one of the key debates over the construction of the Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 洪災重新引發了就建設三峽大壩的主要爭議之一。

sentences.english: The Three Gorges Dam is there, and is impossible to tear down.
sentences.chinese: 三峽大壩就在那裏，並且不可能拆毀。

sentences.english: The dam further imperils delicate fish populations in the Yangtze.
sentences.chinese: 三峽大壩也進一步威脅着長江瀕危魚類的種羣繁殖。

sentences.english: The Three Gorges Dam is the largest water conservancy project in Yangtze Vally.
sentences.chinese: 三峽大壩是長江流域最大的水利工程。

sentences.english: Another would bring water from the Three Gorges reservoir to the Danjiangkou reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面要把三峽大壩的水帶入丹江口水庫。

sentences.english: Both Gezhouba Project and Three-gorges dam are built in Yichang.
sentences.chinese: 葛洲壩工程和三峽大壩都處在宜昌。

sentences.english: One case is China's Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 中國的三峽大壩就是一個例子。

sentences.english: Water being released from the Three Gorges Dam in central China's Hubei province.
sentences.chinese: 水流從中國中部湖北省三峽大壩被釋放出來。

sentences.english: Once completed, the Three Gorges Dam will be the largest and most powerful hydro-electric project in the world.
sentences.chinese: 一旦完工，三峽大壩將成爲世界上最大的水電站。

sentences.english: Engineers discovered cracks on the face of the Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 工程師發現，三峽大壩表面有裂痕。

sentences.english: Just the Ming Dynasty Wall dwarfs10 the Three Gorges dam project, " Lindesay says."
sentences.chinese: 光是明代長城就使三峽大壩工程相形見絀。

sentences.english: Situated downstream from the dam, Dongting Lake is the second largest fresh water lake in China.
sentences.chinese: 洞庭湖位於三峽大壩下游，是中國第二大淡水湖。

sentences.english: For example, species can be propagated through the huge Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 比如，巨大的三峽大壩就有可能給物種入侵帶來機會。

sentences.english: Tian-E-Zhou is 250 kilometers east of Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 天鵝洲保護區位於三峽大壩以東250公里的位置。

sentences.english: Besides the lack of rain, some experts blame the Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 除了缺乏降雨外，有些專家還歸因於三峽大壩。

sentences.english: Flood control was one of the primary reasons for building the Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 三峽大壩的防洪效益一直是該工程的效益之首。

definition: Dacun township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
Hong Kong Wetland Park, in Yuen Long, New Territories
pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Shi1 di4 Gong1 yuan2

definition: Tun District – area of Taichung (in Taiwan) between the coastal (western) part of the city and the mountains to the east
Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, abbr. 寧|宁[Ning2], capital Yinchuan 銀川|银川[Ying2 chuan1]
pinyin: Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1

definition: Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
Renai or Jenai township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Pingyuan county in Meizhou 梅州, Guangdong
Andes mountain chain of South America
